section.title: Integration of Jira into NovaForge
section.para: The version of Jira integrated in NovaForge is 6.0.7. The main users and projects management features and interface has been disabled, NovaForge is managing them.
It is possible to add many configurations depending on projects needs like workflows or custom fields.

Basic project configuration could be defined by project administrators, advanced configuration have to be set by the super-administrator in the system. For any modification project administrators can not perform, ask to the NovaForge super-administrator!
Three plugins have been integrated to Jira :

listitem.para: Jira Agile
Service Desk
Tempo

section.title: Jira Agile
section.para: Jira Agile plugin allow Scrum and Kamban project management by :

listitem.para: using agile specific types of issues : epic, story and task ;
using agile specific user interface : the dashboard ;
having the possibility to prioritize a backlog and to organise sprints ;
using agile specific reporting : the burndown graph ;

section.title: Service Desk
section.para: Service Desk plugin allow to manage Maintenance project by using

listitem.para: easly defining and managing Service Level Agreements (SLA) using Java Query Language ;
configuring a simple and intuitive portal for the client use ;
defining queues of issue to resolve depending on their priority defined by their SLAs ;
defining alerts when a issue may not respect one of it's SLAs ;

section.title: Tempo
section.para: Tempo plugin is a time tracking plugin that allow to track user's worklogs by :

listitem.para: having a user interface of timesheet by user, by groups or by project ;
helping you to planificate and manage developer disponibility ;
Having time reports by user and project ;
